mapper.select: SELECT r1.DETAIL_ID PARENT_DATAIL_ID, r1.CUISINE_ID PARENT_CUISINE_ID, r1.DETAIL_CUISINE_NAME PARENT_DETAIL_CUISINE_NAME, r1.PARENT_CUISINE_ID PARENT_PARENT_CUISINE_ID, r2.DETAIL_ID, r2.CUISINE_ID, r2.DETAIL_CUISINE_NAME, r2.PARENT_CUISINE_ID FROM res_cuisine_detail r1 left JOIN res_cuisine_detail r2 ON r1.DETAIL_ID=r2.PARENT_CUISINE_ID WHERE r1.PARENT_CUISINE_ID IS NULL

SELECT rcd1.DETAIL_ID PARENT_DATAIL_ID, rcd1.DETAIL_CUISINE_NAME PARENT_DETAIL_CUISINE_NAME, rcd1.CUISINE_ID PARENT_CUISINE_ID, rcd1.PARENT_CUISINE_ID PARENT_PARENT_CUISINE_ID, rcd2.DETAIL_ID, rcd2.DETAIL_CUISINE_NAME, rcd2.CUISINE_ID, rcd2.PARENT_CUISINE_ID, rf.FOOD_ID, rf.FOOD_NAME FROM res_cuisine_detail rcd1, res_cuisine_detail rcd2, res_food rf WHERE FIND_IN_SET( rcd1.DETAIL_ID, getChildList (#{detailId}) ) AND rcd1.DETAIL_ID = rcd2.PARENT_CUISINE_ID AND rcd2.DETAIL_ID = rf.DETAIL_ID
